text:
Company Background
Garcia PLC is a leading multinational firm specializing in comprehensive business solutions. We pride ourselves on fostering an inclusive work environment where every employee is valued and empowered. 

Job Type
Full-time

Job Description
Garcia PLC is seeking a highly organized and diligent Human Resources Administrative Assistant to join our HR team. This role supports various HR functions, including employee onboarding, maintaining personnel records, and facilitating HR projects.

Responsibilities
- Assist in employee onboarding and offboarding processes.
- Maintain and update personnel records and databases.
- Coordinate HR projects and prepare reports.
- Support recruitment processes by scheduling interviews and coordinating communication with candidates.
- Ensure compliance with labor regulations.
- Respond to internal and external HR-related inquiries.

Qualifications and Experience Needed
- Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or related field.
- Proven work experience as an HR Administrative Assistant or similar role.
- Strong analytical skills and attention to detail.
- Excellent organizational and time-management abilities.
- Proficient in MS Office Suite.
- Familiarity with HR software and databases is a plus.
- Strong communication skills and the ability to work independently.

Perks and Benefits
- Competitive salary ranging from $40,000 to $55,000 annually, based on experience and skills.
- Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance.
- Generous paid time off and holidays.
- Professional development opportunities.
- Collaborative and inclusive work environment.
